sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-textarea
        clearable
        clear-icon="mdi-trash-can-outline"
        label="한/영타 변환기"
        v-model="inputText"
    ></v-textarea>
    {{convert}}
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
// Components

export default defineComponent({
  name: "HomeView",

  data: () => ({
    inputText: ""
  }),

  computed: {
    convert() {
      let outputText = "";
      for (let i = 0; i < this.inputText.length; i++) {
        switch (this.inputText[i]) {
            // For English to Hangul
          case "r":
            outputText += "ㄱ";
            break;
          case "R":
            outputText += "ㄲ";
            break;
          case "s":
            outputText += "ㄴ";
            break;
          case "e":
            outputText += "ㄷ";
            break;
          case "E":
            outputText += "ㄸ";
            break;
          case "f":
            outputText += "ㄹ";
            break;
          case "a":
            outputText += "ㅁ";
            break;
          case "q":
            outputText += "ㅂ";
            break;
          case "Q":
            outputText += "ㅃ";
            break;
          case "t":
            outputText += "ㅅ";
            break;
          case "T":
            outputText += "ㅆ";
            break;
          case "d":
            outputText += "ㅇ";
            break;
          case "w":
            outputText += "ㅈ";
            break;
          case "W":
            outputText += "ㅉ";
            break;
          case "c":
            outputText += "ㅊ";
            break;
          case "z":
            outputText += "ㅋ";
            break;
          case "x":
            outputText += "ㅌ";
            break;
          case "v":
            outputText += "ㅍ";
            break;
          case "g":
            outputText += "ㅎ";
            break;

            // For Hangul to English
          case "ㄱ":
            outputText += "r";
            break;
          case "ㄲ":
            outputText += "R";
            break;
          case "ㄴ":
            outputText += "s";
            break;
          case "ㄷ":
            outputText += "e";
            break;
          case "ㄸ":
            outputText += "E";
            break;
          case "ㄹ":
            outputText += "f";
            break;
          case "ㅁ":
            outputText += "a";
            break;
          case "ㅂ":
            outputText += "q";
            break;
          case "ㅃ":
            outputText += "Q";
            break;
          case "ㅅ":
            outputText += "t";
            break;
          case "ㅆ":
            outputText += "T";
            break;
          case "ㅇ":
            outputText += "d";
            break;
          case "ㅈ":

    }
  },

  components: {
  },
});
</script>
<style scoped>
@font-face {
  font-family: 'LINESeedKR-Bd';
  src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/projectnoonnu/noonfonts_11-01@1.0/LINESeedKR-Bd.woff2') format('woff2');
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: normal;
}

* {
  font-family: 'LINESeedKR-Bd';
}
</style>
